base_description: Rectangular black toaster with two slots.
part_description: Two slots on top, lever on side, four small legs underneath.
internal_interaction_description: The lever lowers bread into the slots, engaging internal heating elements. These elements surround the bread, toasting it evenly. A timer mechanism controls toasting duration, automatically releasing the lever to pop up the bread when done.
external_interaction_description: The toaster interacts with bread slices, inserting them into slots. A person operates the lever to start toasting. The toaster must be plugged into an electrical outlet to function, and it heats up externally while in use.
